attributes.action: Close the UK borders completely with no travel in or out of the UK
attributes.additional_details: If this variant was to get into our country all our hard work will be in vain. A new wave could happen that we cannot control with immunisations and once again will have a huge impact on our economy, education and lives as a whole
attributes.background: Close the borders completely to ensure the new coronavirus variant found in South Africa and Brazil does not get into our country after fears the vaccine may not work on these new variants

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165
